text: Yedina kapata bisbasi purusa o kapata bisbasini narira muminaderake balabeh tomara amadera jan'ye apeksa kara, amara'o kichu alo niba tomadera jyoti theke. Bala habeh tomara pichane phire ya'o o alora khomja kara. Atahpara ubhaya dalera majhakhane khara kara habe ekati pracira, yara ekati daraja habe. Tara abhyantare thakabe rahamata ebam ba'ire thakabe ayaba.
